thread.title: Komets takes preaseason decision from Evansville
thread.title_full: Komets takes preaseason decision from Evansville

title: Komets takes preaseason decision from Evansville
text:
Komets takes preaseason decision from Evansville 
By Dean Pantazi - 21 Alive October 10, 2015 Updated Oct 10, 2015 at 12:15 AM EDT 
FORT WAYNE, Ind. (21 Alive) - Trevor Cheek tallied a pair of goals as the Komets took a 6-5 preseason decision from the Evansville Icemen on Friday night. 
Spencer Martin stopped 29 of 34 shots in gojng all the way in goal. 
Other Fort Wayne goals came from Brock Montgomery, P.J. Fenton, Garrett Meurs, and Alex Bezile. 
The two teams meet again Saturday night back at the Memorial Coliseum.
